title: Total of 200 out-of-service SLTB buses repaired and added to fleet
content: A total of 200 buses, which had been taken out of service due to dilapidation, were repaired and re-added to the passenger transportation under the patronage of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the Presidential Secretariat premises this morning (Feb. 22).The project was implemented based on a concept of State Minister of Vehicle Regulation, Bus Transport Services and Train Compartments, and Motor Car Industry Dilum Amunugama and under the guidance of Transport Minister Pavithra Wanniarachchi.
